info.name: daylight__polling_03
info.description:
Sets basic setup of daylight on input 1 and Occupancy on input 2 via wet contact input. If room is vacant daylight should not effect light levels and pwm. If room is occupied daylight should effect light levels and pwm.

Response set for fc messages are:
FC message  % level
50      0
40      10
30      25
20      50
10      75
0      100

These correspond to the 0-10V readings on input 1 (daylight) of 
        [0.0,50],
        [1.5,50],
        [2.3,50],
        [3.1,40],
        [4.9,40],
        [5.7,30],
        [6.1,20],
        [7.2,20],
        [8.5,10],
        [9.3,10]
that are defined in the FCLookup method in the rpdg_utils.js file

Any changes to this table will break the test !!!

exec: tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level === 0;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level === 0;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level === 0;

item.name: Set DL Interval to 1 sec & wait 1.5sec

exec: tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level === 0;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level === 0;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level === 0;
tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level == 100;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level == 100;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level == 100;

item.name: Set DL Interval to 1 sec & wait 1.5sec

exec: tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level == 75;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level == 100;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level == 75;

item.name: Set DL Interval to 1 sec & wait 1.5sec

exec: tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level == 50;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level == 100;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level == 50;
tests["Value of fixture 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[0].level === 0;
tests["Value of plc 1 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[1].level === 0;
tests["Value of output 019D35B9 is correct"] = jsonData.fixtures[2].level === 0;
